def chefLuck():
    
    t = int(raw_input())
    while (t > 0):
        t -= 1
        
        n = int(raw_input())
        
        q = n / 7
        r = n % 7
        
        if r == 0:
            print 7 * q
        elif (r == 1 or r == 5):
            if q-1 >= 0:
                print 7 * (q-1)
            else:
                print -1
        elif (r == 2 or r == 6):
            if q-2 >= 0:
                print 7 * (q-2)
            else:
                print -1
        elif r == 3:
            if q-3 >= 0:
                print 7 * (q-3)
            else:
                print -1
        elif r == 4:
            print 7 * q
    pass

chefLuck()
